title: Spicy sausage pasta with lettuce
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '2 good quality pork chipolatas', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 red chilli, finely diced', 'sea salt and cracked pepper to taste', '1/4 teaspoon fennel seeds, crushed in a pestle and mortar', '225g passata', '1 teaspoon granulated sugar', '85g pasta to serve, such as ditali', '1 small romaine lettuce, shredded', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
